entry.title: NOMAD 3 - Third time lucky?
entry.summary: I intend to use this blog to announce new features, releases etc but since this is my first post here I will try to explain little bit of the background of this project and outline where I would like to take it in near and even distant future.
entry.content: I intend to use this blog to announce new features, releases etc but since this is my first post here I will try to explain little bit of the background of this project and outline where I would like to take it in near and even distant future.
